Articles.Content:
There is probably a way to monitor the server activity, either it's someone who somehow didn't get the memo or (more likely) someone who is trying to annoy us.

that wouldn't be the first time

21 minutes ago, Fluburtur said:

There is probably a way to monitor the server activity, either it's someone who somehow didn't get the memo or (more likely) someone who is trying to annoy us.

that wouldn't be the first time

[Edited for easier viewing]

When has it happened before?

Someone broke several parts of the circuit at the Paradise station, I don't know wether it was one of the ones who built it who was going to upgrade it (very unlikely) or someone that wanted to annoy everyone.

Only specific parts were destroyed and it wasn't blind destruction so my guess is that someone is playing with us.

43 minutes ago, DarkOwl57 said:

hhhmmm..... Mystery

Place observers in strategic places? Or I could just do this: 

Who is it? If you tell me it's ok. I promise I won't report you to any of the server operators! I won't get you in trouble (although if someone else does that's not my fault)!

9 minutes ago, max_creative said:

A command block set to always active with a command to check if the dirt is broken and if it is teleport the nearest player to the lake to a bedrock jail? ! 

But if someone goes mining, we go to jail.

7 minutes ago, DarkOwl57 said:

But if someone goes mining, we go to jail.

Yeah...

Why don't we just tell people to stop breaking stuff to annoy us and if we catch them then we will tell the operators? 

Or we could set a command block that gives anyone who steps in the lake mining fatigue? So then they just can't break it. Or we could redirect the railway to go around the lake.

It is quite mysterious. If this happens again (even though Sparky lowered the track and fixed it kinda), it might be a griefer trying to annoy us. I'm not a fan of the bedrock prison idea, since a lot of people (including me) live close to the lake.

19 minutes ago, ZentroCatson said:

It is quite mysterious. If this happens again (even though Sparky lowered the track and fixed it kinda), it might be a griefer trying to annoy us. I'm not a fan of the bedrock prison idea, since a lot of people (including me) live close to the lake.

Yeah... I agree it's a horrible idea... I guess we just deal with it and hope nobody does it again...

I just got off.

Today I forgot where the nether portal to the Creative is, experienced kinetic energy a few times, went splat a lot, and got nothing done...

1 hour ago, max_creative said:

I just got off.

Today I forgot where the nether portal to the Creative is, experienced kinetic energy a few times, went splat a lot, and got nothing done...  

Remind me to mark the portal...

59 minutes ago, RA3236 said:

Remind me to mark the portal...

Ok. 

MARK THE PORTAL!!! 

There. Done. 

Yes, Comic Sans in red text with three exclamation points and bold and italics was very necessary.

35 minutes ago, max_creative said:

Ok. 

MARK THE PORTAL!!! 

There. Done. 

Yes, Comic Sans in red text with three exclamation points and bold and italics was very necessary. 

The portal is now considered to be marked (aka a load of cobblestone blocks leading the way from the Nether Fortress)

So today my list of accomplishments includes:

Skydiving from the newest towers in paradise

Uncovering a terrorist (again in Paradise)

Explored a ghost ship (On the highway to Paradise) (AAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH!!!!!)

Hired Sparky as an employee (yay!)

and....

Got a new horse. (woot woot!!!)

Oh! I almost forgot. I am creating a brand-new thing for the server! Get this: The PCSC.

Paradise City Skydiving Championship

So basically here's the main part of the championship: The divers must jump off of the tower (There will be 5 towers used over 6 events) and land at a target a certain distance away. The scoring is this: Center: 4 points. Inner Ring: 3 Points. Middle Ring: 2 Points. Outer Ring: 1 Point. Out of Ring: 0 Points.

You have 3 Jumps per round, with 2 rounds per event (Again, 6 events in the entire season). The total points in both rounds determine your score for the entire event. (i.e. 9 points in round 1 and 2 equals 18 total points.). The championship points are determined by the event points (i.e. If a person gets 10 points in 1 event, they have 10 championship points). 

The Schedule (Hopefully; I'm hoping that the owners of the towers won't mind) is as follows:

1) The IDS Center

2) Florid's Tower (The blue spire one)

3) The new white tower that's not finished (The one with the tree on one of the levels)

4) The new brown/red tower near the IDS Center

5) Dfthu's newest tower (I think the Enterprise Building?)

6) (Finale) The IDS Center (Again.)

Championship banquet (The place the top 2 will go for a party after the season): Sanctuary. (Probably the new library or something big like that).

 

Any tips on how to make this better? Let me know!

My team, Owl Flight Team, is (So far) The only team listed. Let me know if you want to create your own team or join mine!

(Good luck)

On ‎04‎/‎12‎/‎2016 at 8:38 AM, ZentroCatson said:

SPARKY! We've been waiting for you and worrying about you the entire time! I'm glad you're alright, you're a really good friend  

@transitbiker I visited your island house yesterday, its not hard to understand why you built your house in such a remote location. The island archipel is just beautiful  Do you have an idea how we should call it? I want to build myself a chillout place (probably a houseboat) there and Max said something about viking ships... Are you alright with people building stuff there? You're the landlord, after all.

I wanted to build a nether pathway there at first, but I think going to such a beautiful place should be a little challenge. What do you think?

Ps. Don't worry about me getting into sticky situations, if I'm out adventuring, I normally have my diamond armor and superbow on me. And I'm a really good archer

On ‎01‎/‎12‎/‎2016 at 6:34 AM, ZooNamedGames said:

Server Announcement

Effective December 10th, the server will be undergoing some changes to adjust for  a few new systems we'll have in place. 

1st- The economy system will begin. It will work off of a barter system initially. As time goes on we may experiment by adding a currency but that's later on. 

2nd- To encourage use of the economy system and to get us back to playing the game normally, access to creative will be cut off to all players (except mods because of reason 3). 

3rd- Along with economy, there will now be jobs for members to take for income. (Forum Moderators Please Note No RP is occurring on this forum post and any posts attempting to will be reported immediately). Jobs can be anything from handyman doing tasks for players, firemen, A lumberjack and more. More information will be given on the Discord channel along with a Google doc I'll link there. 

4th- To those who donate to help @MK3424 (one hosting all this), will receive special perks. Poor guy'a burning up his internet bill for us, isn't that worth something?

Again, this isn't going to take place until then. Anything questions/concerns should be sent to me. 

In the meantime, have fun  !

..........."access to creative will be cut off ".....zooooooooooo!
Wait, why's the economy system going in? I feel like we're doing pretty good with our trading right now...
